text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Because of lack of demand and processing caused by the shut down from Covid-19 and the logistics there-in, we are plowing under vegetables from coast to coast, they have euthanized millions of chickens, are dumping milk by the hundreds of thousands of gallons, and aborting sows.
